name: Nomaders
overview: Nomaders local heroes is a new travel platform that transforms travelers into locals, and totally changes the experience of visiting a place. Nomaders makes the dream of every traveler come true: Feel like you live there. How do we achieve this? Nomaders introduces a new travel protagonist: THE LOCAL HERO, a volunteer that showcases a unique aspect of a destination. Not only can travelers take advantage of trip logistics with our flight and hotel booking platform, but they can also leverage the network of local heroes to explore hidden aspects of their destination.
